QuestData.Title: Batteries Not Yet Included
QuestData.Description: Okay! Using the spare parts you've found for me, I've got a framework roughed out for my versatile new assault vehicle. All I need now is a compact power supply.$B$BI've noticed that the indigenous wildlife here packs quite the punch, electrostatically speaking. Can you hunt down Thunderheads near the base here and get me an intact electrogizard? It might take a few kills to find a usable gland.
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire a Humming Electrogizard from a Thunderhead in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.CompletionText: It must be an enormous evolutionary advantage to be able to shoot lightning. From your face.
QuestData.RewardText: <The gizard shocks Mizzy as you hand it over, blasting her to the ground.>$B$BOh, OH! That's nasty! I love it!
